name: Cluck Frenzy
description:
Cluck Frenzy combines Strategy and PVP gameplay to provide a wild party game experience set in a mad farmer’s barn. Yes, really. With nothing but their small skillsets, agility and plenty of fur, our cute critters are ready for a clucking crazy heist.






Use your knowledge of exploration and strategy to get one up on your friends and collect the most chickens without getting caught by the farmer or his traps!






Discover every nook and cranny of the crazily intricate barn built by Haymitch the mad farmer. Run, jump and hide as you potentially find secrets to piece together more about the characters in Cluck Frenzy.
